text: Koraa, â€˜ma'i tomalokaka iyatakaiyo nikrsta parainamara sambada dima ne yito allahara ocarata ache? Yara oparata allahe abhisampata karaiche arau yara oparata te'om kraodhanbita haiche. Yisakalara majara paraa kichumanaka bandara arau kichumanaka gaharai bana'ichila arau (sihamtara kichumane) tagutara upasana karaichila. Sihamte'i arasthanara disara paraa nikrsta arau sarala pathara paraa ata'itakai bechi bicyutaâ€™
